Class: GamefiveSDK

GamefiveSDK

new GamefiveSDK(autoInitopt)

Main SDK Class
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
autoInit boolean <optional>
 false if TRUE the constructor calls init function at startup

Methods

endSession(endingParamsopt)

Define the end of a session. startSession must be called first.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
endingParams object <optional>
 Some parameters can be sent inside an object to enrich the user statistics.
Properties
Name Type Description
score object User score for the ended session.
Source:
  • gfsdk.js, line 123

init(confObjectopt)

Initialize the SDK with current data
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
confObject object <optional>
 Configuration object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
logEnabled boolean <optional>
 false Logging state, only for debug
httpEnabled boolean <optional>
 true Enable/Disable xhr calls, should always be TRUE
Source:
  • gfsdk.js, line 99

startSession()

Define the start of a session, where a session should be a continued user activity delimitated by a user interaction like a game match. Init must be called first or autoInit must be TRUE.
Source:
  • gfsdk.js, line 113

status() → {Object}

Get SDK Status and Data

Object containing Session and User Information
